subject: Re: [junit] How to get the time of execution of individual method in Junit Test Case?
msgSnippet: ... JUnit is not a profiler. There are a number of profilers for Java, both free and commercial. Google Java profiler for details. -- J. B. Rainsberger,
messageBody:
BASAVARAJ.D.KHADABADI wrote:

> Hi,
> When we execute a Junit test case,we get the time of execution of
> that test.Similarly, I want to know, is there any tool which can help me
> in finding the time of execution of individual method in Junit Test Case.

JUnit is not a profiler. There are a number of profilers for Java, both
free and commercial. Google "Java profiler" for details.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
